text: Berlin-Chemie AG is a German Pharmaceutical company based in Berlin, Germany. It is part of the Menarini Group. ==History== Berlin-Chemie considers the establishment of a plant for the laboratory preparations of the Chemical factory of Kahlbaum in Berlin-Adlershof in 1890, as its origin. The first factory located in the former administrative district of TreptowDistrict, Berlin-Adlershof. In 1927 after the merger with Schering AG employees began the development of drugs. ==References== ==External links== * Category:Companies based in Berlin Category:Pharmaceutical companies of Germany
title: Berlin Chemie
